UserProfile.description: View your profile, learning progress and account settings.

Settings.title: Your Profile
Settings.description: How others see you on the site.
Settings.usernameDescription: Your public handle. It can be your real name or a cool alias. Also, it is your login.
Settings.emailDescription: Your go-to contact. Expect notifications, confirmations, and password reset emails here.
Settings.lastNameDescription: Your family name, shared with the community.
Settings.bioPlaceholder: Let us in on who you are. Share your passions, interests, or aspirations in a few words.
Settings.bioDescription: This part is optional. Tell us a bit about yourself if you feel like it.

Friends.friendsDescription: Here you can see a list of your friends.
Friends.receivedInvitationsDescription: Here you can see a list of received friend invitations.
Friends.sentInvitationsDescription: Here you can see a list of sent friend invitations.

Preferences.title: Preferences
Preferences.description: Update your app preferences. Choose theme, set your preffered language and font settings.
Preferences.languageDescription: This is the language that will be used across application.
Preferences.fontDescription: Set the font you want to use in the dashboard.
Preferences.themeDescription: Select the theme for the dashboard.
